entry.title: Masks Under Masks
entry.summary:
Author: Judysupremus

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,203Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 77

Summary: The air is still and heavy, carrying no sound of distant cries or alarms. The quiet is in stark contrast to the sound of fighting that comes from his earpiece. Danger is never far away in Gotham. But Batman takes a brief moment to take in the view of towering skyscrapers and kaleidoscope of colors from all the lights. The moment passes and he prepares to launch himself to the next roof and continue his patrol.Only to freeze at the subtle and sudden presence of a breeze. It lifts the sounds of the city into the night sky. He turns quickly to his right and pulls up short. The figure sharing his perch is in white and arctic blue with...rabbit ears."Violet." With a slight nod he acknowledges them.The figure salutes and just...portals away.

entry.title: Staying At Wayne Manor
entry.summary:
Author: FoxyRouge_99

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,690Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 60

Summary: Ok so this is a working title so probs will be changed.Damianette is already official. After Lila joined the class, Marinette's world went downhill. She lost all her friends and people she could trust. But with help from her partner and new friends, Hawkmoth was defeated. Now with identities revealed and new revelations, there is no use for the miraculous. But after the Miraculous Trio (as they now call themselves) join the Justice League to help with abroad crime, things start to look up. After Marinette meets robin, and then afterwards Damian, they both immediately hit it off. A year later, Damianette is official (but secret), friendships are blooming and all is well. But then, the akuma class wins a trip to Gotham to stay at Wayne manor. With Lila and web of lies following, Marinette goes to Gotham. Now reunited with her boyfriend, it is getting all the harder to keep them a secret. Will they manage it? Will Lie-la and her lies get their first? Will she be exposed?

entry.title: My One And Only
entry.summary:
Author: yannowhatigiveup

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 104,282Chapters: 34/?Kudos: 1,709

Summary: Damian Wayne convinced his father to let him go to Paris to learn more about these 'mysterious attacks'. Little did he know he would find a pretty little girl with bluebell eyes. Meanwhile, Adrien Agreste contemplates whether Marinette is 'just a friend'. Little did he know he was already too late.This is my first mlb fanfic, actually it's my first fanfic here on ao3.Disclaimer: The batfam members will be incorrect as I'm not part of the dc fan base. I just thought the ship was cute. And Iâ€™m not that good with writing either. You have been warned.July 2025 edit: returned from hiatus

entry.title: I Got Isekaiâ€™d Into Miraculousâ€”Now They Want Me to Break the Love-Square?! Tch. Iâ€™m a Robin. Iâ€™ll Fix It My Way.
entry.summary:
Author: krono20112025

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,421Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 92

Summary: Five years Damian waited for the last Miraculous Ladybug manga, and the ending sucks. Enraged, he boasted he could write a better story.A mischievous, fourth-dimensional imp quickly appears and gives him a chance to prove his claim.To prevent a disappointing ending, he must change the plot as he sees fit. What would a genius detective, Robin, do in the MLB Universe, to cause Chaos of course!And He has a task to fulfill, a mission to accomplish: prevent the Love-Square from forming. Be the home-wrecker and steal Marinette from Adrien.Is he going to do it? For the sake of the mission? We'll see.

entry.title: The Future is Ahead of Us, Not Set in Stone
entry.summary:
Author: Zi_Xi_Zy

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 115,432Chapters: 50/50Kudos: 631

Summary: In her final year of lycÃ©e, Marinette moves to Gotham for various reasons. Meanwhile, Damian Wayne, in his last year of high school, is ready to leave the Robin mantle behind and follow his own path away from his vigilante family.But as he steps away from one destiny, another reveals itselfâ€”one tied to the Miraculous, to the power of restoration, and to the girl who was never meant to wield the Ladybug Miraculous in the first place.When Marinette and Damian meet, it becomes undeniable: the roles they were forced into were never meant for them. She was born for the Black Cat. He was made for the Ladybug. And together, they must uncover the truth behind the Miraculous, the Order, and their own tangled legacies before itâ€™s too late.

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,653Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 917

Summary: It was the most peculiar thing to see Daniel Fenton and Marinette Dupain-Cheng vehemently turn down a project. There was disgust. Barely concealed loathing. What was so strange about their bossesâ€™ offer? They were about to be given a chance to redesign the suits of Justice League members and renovate part of the Watchtower.On a completely unrelated note, an incident with the Order and the use of ectoplasm forces the Celestial Guardian and the King of the Infinite Realms to finally meet.

entry.title: Pinocchio (Or Demon Spawn Becomes a Real Boy)
entry.summary:
Author: Mentally12ReadingPJO

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 74,667Chapters: 24/42Kudos: 6,015

Summary: My first writing attempt in years and my first fanfic: read at your own risk :).Damian's brothers are curious: the demon seems to be acting like a real boy. It was subtle at first, but it became increasingly obvious when he called someone they caught "sus". It was even less subtle when they found him scrolling on his phone in a blanket at 2 am and whispered "ding" while flicking his wrist. Needless to say they were concerned.Will be continued far in the future...

Author: issadaminetteshipper

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,038Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 13

Summary: After a year apart, Marinette is unexpectedly reassigned to 3B, the apartment she once shared with her former bandmates and ex-best friends. Facing unresolved tensions and unspoken feelings, especially with Damian, she must navigate old wounds and new challenges as they all try to find a way to coexist. What started as a bitter goodbye may not be so easy to leave behind.

entry.title: Soggy Promises
